DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare C13-CAC Breath Test 24-hour Gastric pH Monitoring Patients Gastric Acid-related Diseases Healthy Volunteers
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Study Between C13-CAC Breath Test 24-hour Gastric pH Monitoring
DOC.criteria: Patients Gastric Acidrelated disease like peptic ulcer gastroesophageal reflux disease investigator 's judgment Healthy subject determine history Helicobacter pylorus infection Patients hypercalcemia Patients hypothyroidism Patients hyperparathyroidism History upper gastrointestinal surgery resection Any condition would limit subject 's ability complete 24hour gastric pH monitoring
